title: Russian aviation conducted airstrikes at Vodolahy, Bilovody, Nova Kozacha, Vysoka Yaruha, Bohuslavka, Kupyansk, Novoosynove, ...
content: Russian aviation conducted airstrikes at Vodolahy, Bilovody, Nova Kozacha, Vysoka Yaruha, Bohuslavka, Kupyansk, Novoosynove, Neskuchne, Petropavlivka, Lozova, Rayhorodok, Ivanivka, Zorya, Romanivka, Siversk, Zakitne, Stinky, Mykolayivka, Romanivka, Kostyantynivka, Sukha Balka, Stara Mykolayivka, Oleksandropil, Hannivka, Velyka Novosilka, Sukhi Yaly, Temyrivka, Zelene Pole, Kozatske, Tryfonivka, - General Staff of Armed Forces of Ukraine reports
author: Live UA Map
